meta.objective: Execute final P3 tasks: Parallel Execution, Diagnostics Metrics, and UI Resilience.

phases.name: Parallel Engine Execution
phases.description: Run independent analysis engines concurrently to reduce latency.

tasks.issue: Sequential execution of independent engines (Emotion, Tone, Integrity) slows down response.
tasks.action: Use `concurrent.futures.ThreadPoolExecutor` to run `self.emotion.analyze(raw)`, `self.tone.detect_key(raw)`, and `self.integrity.scan(raw)` in parallel at the start of the pipeline. Wait for results before proceeding to dependent steps (Rhythm/Style).

phases.name: Metrics & Diagnostics Implementation
phases.description: Fill empty diagnostic fields to enable real monitoring.

tasks.issue: Diagnostic runtime metrics (`runtime_ms`) and engine statuses are placeholders.
tasks.action: Implement `stop_timer` logic to calculate real `runtime_ms`. Ensure `update_engine_status` stores success/fail states correctly.

tasks.issue: Monolith does not report execution metrics.
tasks.action: Measure execution time of `analyze` and pass it to `self.diagnostics.record_metric(...)` or similar method before returning result.

phases.name: UI Fault Tolerance
phases.description: Prevent UI crashes on partial data availability.

tasks.issue: UI components crash if optional keys (like 'fanf' or 'breathing') are missing from result.
tasks.action: Wrap data extraction in helper functions with safe defaults (e.g., `result.get('fanf', {})`). Ensure `KeyError` or `NoneType` errors do not break the rendering loop.
